tit.cmt: タイトルなので補足をのぞきました。

sen.j: 明円（みょうえん/めいえん、生年不詳 - 正治元年（1199年））は、平安時代末期-鎌倉時代初期の仏師。
sen.e: Myoen (Meien) (birth and death dates are unknown) was a Busshi (sculptor of Buddhist Statues) in the late Kamakura and early Kamakura periods.
Myoen (Meien) (birth and death dates are unknown) was a Busshi (sculptor of Buddhist Statues) during the late Kamakura and early Kamakura periods.
Myoen (also known as Meien) (unknown - 1199) was a Busshi (sculptor of Buddhist Statues) during the late Heian and early Kamakura periods.

sen.j: 円派の優美な伝統的彫刻様式を伝える。
sen.e: He passed down the graceful, traditional sculptural style of Enpa (Myoen school).
He passed down the graceful, traditional sculptural style of Enpa (Myoen school).
He passed down the graceful, traditional sculptural style of Enpa School.

sen.j: 1166年（仁安 (日本)元）近衛基実の法要、阿弥陀如来、観音菩薩、不動明王の三躯を造る。
sen.e: He held memorial services for Motozane KONOE and made three statues; Amida-nyorai, Kannon Bosatsu, and Fudo Myo-o.
He held memorial services for Motozane KONOE and made three statues; Amida-nyorai, Kannon Bosatsu, and Fudo Myo-o.

In 1166, he made following three statues, Amida Nyorai (Amitabha Tathagata), Kannon Bosatsu (Kannon Bodhisattva), and Fudo Myoo (Acala, one of the Five Wisdom Kings) for the memorial services for Motozane KONOE.

sen.j: これにより法橋位に叙せられる。
sen.e: In consideration of these achievements, he was granted Hokkyo rank (the third highest rank for artists of Buddhist sculpture).
In consideration of these achievements, he was granted Hokkyo rank (the third highest rank for artists of Buddhist sculpture).
In consideration of these achievements, he was granted Hokkyo (the third highest rank for Buddhist priests).

sen.j: 1191年（建久2）平重衡の焼打ち後の復興で、興福寺金堂の造仏を手がける。
sen.e: He constructed Buddhist Statues of Kondo hall of Kofuku-ji Temple in the reconstruction of the temple after the fire set by TAIRA no Shigehira in 1180

sen.cmt: 用語集より補足しました。

sen.j: 明円以後円派は衰退した。
sen.e: After Myoen (Meien), Enpa (Myoen school) declined.
After Myoen (Meien), the Enpa (Myoen school) declined.
